arguments.template:
<svg
  #svgContainer
  width="100%"
  height="100%"
  [attr.viewBox]="viewBox"
  [ngClass]="circleValues.customClasses.svgContainer"
>
  <defs *ngIf="circleValues.gradient">
    <linearGradient id="linearGradient">
      <stop
        offset="0"
        [attr.stop-color]="circleValues.gradient.startColor">
      </stop>
      <stop
        offset="1"
        [attr.stop-color]="circleValues.gradient.endColor">
      </stop>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>

  <circle *ngIf="circleValues.backgroundCircle.color"
    class="background-circle"
    [ngClass]="circleValues.customClasses.backgroundCircle"
    [attr.stroke]="circleValues.backgroundCircle.color ? circleValues.backgroundCircle.color : backgroundCircleColor"
    [attr.stroke-width]="circleValues.backgroundCircle.strokeWidth ? circleValues.backgroundCircle.strokeWidth : backgroundCircleWidth"
    [attr.cx]="coordinates.x"
    [attr.cy]="coordinates.y"
    [attr.r]="radius">
  </circle>

  <circle
    *ngIf="circleValues.point"
    [ngClass]="circleValues.customClasses.point"
    [attr.cx]="coordinates.x"
    [attr.cy]="coordinates.y"
    [attr.r]="circleValues.point.radius ? circleValues.point.radius : radius"
    [attr.fill]="circleValues.point.color ? circleValues.point.color : 'none'">
  </circle>

  <text
    *ngIf="circleValues.icon"
    [attr.text-anchor]="circleValues.icon.position ? circleValues.icon.position : 'middle'"
    [attr.x]="circleValues.icon.x ? circleValues.icon.x : coordinates.x"
    [attr.y]="circleValues.icon.y ? circleValues.icon.y : coordinates.y"
    [ngClass]="[circleValues.icon.iconClass, 'fa']">
  </text>

  <text
    *ngIf="circleValues.percent"
    id="percent"
    [attr.text-anchor]="textPosition"
    [attr.x]="coordinates.x + (circleValues.percent.x ? circleValues.percent.x : 0)"
    [attr.y]="coordinates.y + (circleValues.percent.y ? circleValues.percent.y : 0)"
    [attr.fill]="circleValues.percent.color"
    [ngClass]="circleValues.customClasses.percent">
    {{(circleValues.percent.value ? circleValues.percent.value : circleValues.percent) + (circleValues.percent.noPercentageSign ? '' : '%')}}
  </text>

  <text
    *ngIf="circleValues.text"
    [attr.text-anchor]="circleValues.text.position ? circleValues.text.position : textPosition"
    [attr.x]="circleValues.text.x ? circleValues.text.x : coordinates.x"
    [attr.y]="circleValues.text.y ? circleValues.text.y : (coordinates.y + 15)"
    [ngClass]="circleValues.customClasses.text">
    {{circleValues.text.content}}
  </text>

  <path
    class="foreground-circle"
    [ngClass]="circleValues.customClasses.foregroundCircle"
    [attr.d]="arcData"
    [attr.stroke-width]="circleValues.strokeWidth + 'px'"
    [attr.stroke-linecap]="circleValues.strokeLinecap"
    [attr.stroke]="circleValues.gradient ? 'url(#linearGradient)' : circleValues.color">
  </path>
</svg>
